gov.ornl.keva.sstable

Class SSTableBufferAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.sstable.SSTableBufferAllocator

  • public class SSTableBufferAllocator
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class used by sstables to allocate file buffers. The allocator tries to use a memory-mapped buffer if possible, but otherwise will use a normal file-based buffer.
    Author:
    James Horey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_BUFFER_SIZE
      Maximum size of memory mapped buffer (32MB).

      • renewWriteBuffer

        protected java.nio.ByteBuffer renewWriteBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                   long offset,
                                   long size)
        Get another write buffer that is offset from the supplied.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The old byte buffer. The new byte buffer should be mapped to the space after the old buffer.
        size - Maximum size of the new buffer.
        Returns:
        A new mapped bytebuffer

      • getWriteBuffer

        protected java.nio.ByteBuffer getWriteBuffer(java.lang.String path,
                                 long size)
        Get a byte buffer opened for writing.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of where to locate the output file
        size - Maximum size of the buffer
        Returns:
        Writeable byte buffer

        Flush the buffer back to disk.
        Parameters:
